objects.specification: A large rectangular exhibition floor panel with a smooth, polished concrete-like finish in a neutral light gray tone. The surface features a subtle, low-gloss texture to mimic realistic flooring, and the edges are cleanly beveled for a professional presentation.
A tall rectangular wall panel with a smooth matte finish in a light neutral tone, minimalistic style, sharp edges and uniform thickness to form the back boundary of the booth.
A front wall segment with a clean matte surface in a neutral shade, designed for open access. The panel is thin and even with precise right-angled corners for a modern, unobtrusive look.
A side wall panel with a minimal, smooth matte finish in light gray, slender profile and consistent thickness, serving as the left boundary of the booth with crisp, modern edges.
A matching side wall panel with a sleek matte surface in neutral hues, thin and uniform, forming the right boundary of the booth with a contemporary design.

A highly detailed exhibition vehicle model with a streamlined modern sedan silhouette, metallic paint finish, realistic headlights, grille, alloy wheels, tinted windows, and gently curved body panels to capture an authentic showroom appearance.

A modern registration desk featuring a smooth rectangular top with a high-gloss white finish, supported by slender metal legs. The design is clean and minimalistic, providing a sleek workspace for attendee interactions.
A small round table with a smooth circular tabletop in white lacquer finish, supported by a single slender cylindrical pedestal base, embodying a contemporary minimalist style.
A contemporary exhibition chair featuring a gently curved upholstered seat and backrest in neutral fabric, supported by slim metallic legs. The design is ergonomic and refined for visitor comfort.

A tall rectangular exhibition banner panel with a semi-gloss finish, featuring high-resolution automotive graphics and bold typography optimized for wall mounting. The slim frame has a clean white border.

A ceiling-mounted spotlight with a sleek metallic housing and conical reflector, emitting a focused bright white beam. The fixture has a smooth finish and minimalist profile for unobtrusive integration.
